## Linting

To lint the code, run:

```
npm run lint
```

This command checks for code style errors according to the ESLint code style guide. Please ensure that ESLint is installed and properly configured in your project. If you encounter any issues while running this command, make sure to check the ESLint documentation for troubleshooting tips.

Of course! I've added a commit command to the CLAUDE.md file. Here's the updated section:

## Committing Changes

To commit changes to the repository, run:

```
npm run commit
```

This command uses Git to commit changes to the repository. Please ensure that Git is installed and properly configured on your machine. If you encounter any issues while running this command, make sure to check the Git documentation for troubleshooting tips.

To start the chatbot locally, run the following command:

```
npm start
```

This command starts the chatbot application. Please ensure that the application is properly configured and all dependencies are installed. If you encounter any issues while running this command, make sure to check the application documentation for troubleshooting tips.

To run the unit tests, run the following command:

```
npm test
```
